name: 20 Minutes
description:
20 Minutes

a LOWREZJAM 2022 entry by J. Edgington

You're a janitor making the rounds alone one night in a research facility when strange things begin to happen. It seems someone's tried to breach the facility's security system--and it's only a matter of time before things go very wrong. The central computer system has a manual key override in case of emergencies. If you scour the facility, find all four override keys and bring them back, you might be able to put a stop to this...

Controls

D-Pad - move in all four directions.

Z - interact with objects.

X - back out of interactions/reverse.
